QuestData.Title: No Plan Survives Contact with the Enemy
QuestData.Description: Quickly and quietly; that's how SI:7 prefers to operate. That was the plan, at least.$B$BRell Nightwind is already inside Garrosh'ar Point looking for signs of Anduin and Taylor, but it's getting hot in there and he needs support.$B$BFight yer way through these dogs and find Rell!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 6 Garrosh'ar Grunts and 6 Garrosh'ar Gear-Greasers.
QuestData.RewardText: Great work! If you ever decide to give up your life of adventure, the SI:7 could use more talent like you...
